summary:
The Boeing 787 Dreamliner is a large passenger airplane made by Boeing. It was designed to use less fuel and fly longer distances than earlier planes. The 787 can carry up to 336 passengers and has a unique design with a four-window cockpit and special engine covers to reduce noise.

The Dreamliner first flew in 2009 and entered service in 2011 with All Nippon Airways. It has had some problems, like battery fires, which led to temporary grounding. Despite these issues, it is a popular aircraft with over 1,900 orders. The 787 is known for its efficiency and is used for long-haul, point-to-point flights.
title: Boeing 787 Dreamliner
